content: It was charming to see how these girls danced. They had no spectators but the apple-pickers on the ladders.
translations: ita:Era affascinante vedere come danzavano quelle ragazze. Non avevano nessuno spettatore tranne i raccoglitori di mele sull
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
